actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 709 of title 32, United States Code, to provide increased job protection for certain civilian National Guard technicians, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Stipulates that a National Guard technician who: (1) has completed ten years of service in a position in which Guard membership was required; (2) is involuntarily separated from the Guard under honorable conditions; and (3) who continues to meet specified physical fitness standards shall not be required to be a member of the Guard as a condition of employment.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 709 of title 32, United States Code, to provide increased job protection for certain civilian National Guard technicians, and for other purposes.
